name: In The Depths [SCREAM Machine Jam 2020]
description:
GiapetGames presents...

In The Depths

You are a miner working for a mining company. One day you are called in to fix a machine in the mines. But things aren't what they seem as you go farther into the mines...

SCREAM Machine

This is my entry for the SCREAM Machine 2020 Jam! I really really hope you enjoy my entry, and good luck to everyone who enters there game in the Jam! 

Music by Kevin Macleod

Sound effects from Freesound.org
